text: Veena Meettiya Vilangukal is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Cochin Haneefa, starring Madhu, Sukumaran, Rahman, and Jayabharathi in the lead roles. http://www.malayalacinema.com/review_veena-meettiya-vilangukal-.htm ==Cast== * Madhu as Velappan * Rahman as Dileep * Jayabharathi * Urvasi as Geetha * Sukumaran * Jose as Gopy * Jose Prakash as Dr.Sreenivasan * Unni * Prathapachandran * K. B. Ganesh Kumar as Unni Sreenivasan * Jagannadha Varma * KPAC Sunny as Viswanathan * KR Savithri * M. S. Thripunithura * Mala Aravindan * Monisha as Sreedevi * Valsala Menon *Cochin Haneefa as A.S.P Sudheedran ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Veena Meettiya Vilangukal
